an5.90:4.1: “These five things lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
an5.90:4.3: Firstly, a mendicant trainee has many duties and responsibilities, and is competent in many tasks.
an5.90:4.4: They neglect solitude, and are not committed to internal serenity of heart.
an5.90:4.5: This the first thing that leads to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
an5.90:5.1: Furthermore, a mendicant trainee spends their day doing trivial work.
an5.90:5.2: They neglect solitude, and are not committed to internal serenity of heart.
an5.90:5.3: This the second thing that leads to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
an5.90:6.1: Furthermore, a mendicant trainee mixes closely with laypeople and renunciants, socializing inappropriately like a layperson.
an5.90:6.2: They neglect solitude, and are not committed to internal serenity of heart.
an5.90:6.3: This the third thing that leads to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
an5.90:7.1: Furthermore, a mendicant trainee enters the town at the wrong time, and returns too late in the day.
an5.90:7.2: They neglect solitude, and are not committed to internal serenity of heart.
an5.90:7.3: This the fourth thing that leads to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
an5.90:8.1: Furthermore, a mendicant trainee doesn’t get to take part in talk about self-effacement that helps open the heart, when they want, without trouble or difficulty. That is,
an5.90:8.2: talk about fewness of wishes, contentment, seclusion, not mixing closely, arousing energy, ethics, samādhi, wisdom, freedom, and the knowledge and vision of freedom.
an5.90:8.3: They neglect solitude, and are not committed to internal serenity of heart.
an5.90:8.4: This the fifth thing that leads to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
an5.90:8.5: These five things lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
an5.90:9.1: These five things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
an5.90:9.3: Firstly, a mendicant trainee doesn’t have many duties and responsibilities, even though they are competent in many tasks.
an5.90:9.4: They don’t neglect solitude, and are committed to internal serenity of heart.
an5.90:9.5: This the first thing that doesn’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
an5.90:10.1: Furthermore, a mendicant trainee doesn’t spend their day doing trivial work.
an5.90:10.2: They don’t neglect solitude, and are committed to internal serenity of heart.
an5.90:10.3: This the second thing that doesn’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
an5.90:11.1: Furthermore, a mendicant trainee doesn’t mix closely with laypeople and renunciants, socializing inappropriately like a layperson.
an5.90:11.2: They don’t neglect solitude, and are committed to internal serenity of heart.
an5.90:11.3: This the third thing that doesn’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
an5.90:12.1: Furthermore, a mendicant trainee doesn’t enter the village too early or return too late in the day.
an5.90:12.2: They don’t neglect solitude, and are committed to internal serenity of heart.
an5.90:12.3: This the fourth thing that doesn’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
an5.90:13.1: Furthermore, a mendicant trainee gets to take part in talk about self-effacement that helps open the heart, when they want, without trouble or difficulty. That is,
an5.90:13.2: talk about fewness of wishes, contentment, seclusion, keeping your distance, arousing energy, ethics, samādhi, wisdom, freedom, and the knowledge and vision of freedom.
an5.90:13.3: They don’t neglect solitude, and are committed to internal serenity of heart.
an5.90:13.4: This the fifth thing that leads to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
an5.90:13.5: These five things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.”
